005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.util.List;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021public final class FnNot {
022  @NonNull
023  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
024      .name("not")
025      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
026      .deterministic()
027      .contextIndependent()
028      .focusIndependent()
029      .argument(IArgument.builder()
030          .name("arg")
031          .type(IItem.class)
032          .zeroOrMore()
033          .build())
034      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
035      .returnOne()
036      .functionHandler(FnNot::execute)
037      .build();
038
039  private FnNot() {
040    // disable construction
041  }
042
043  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
044  @NonNull
045  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
046      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
047      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
048      IItem focus) {
049
050    ISequence<?> items = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.iterator().next());
051
052    IBooleanItem result = fnNot(items);
053    return ISequence.of(result);
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Get the negated, effective boolean value of the provided item.
058   * <p>
059   * Based on the XPath 3.1
060   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-not">fn:not</a>
061   * function.
062   *
063   * @param item
064   *          the item to get the negated, effective boolean value for
065   * @return the negated boolean value
066   */
067  @NonNull
068  public static IBooleanItem fnNot(@NonNull IItem item) {
069    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(!FnBoolean.fnBooleanAsPrimitive(item));
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Get the negated, effective boolean value of the provided item.
074   * <p>
075   * Based on the XPath 3.1
076   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-not">fn:not</a>
077   * function.
078   *
079   * @param sequence
080   *          the sequence to get the negated, effective boolean value for
081   * @return the negated boolean value
082   */
083  @NonNull
084  public static IBooleanItem fnNot(@NonNull ISequence<?> sequence) {
085    return FnBoolean.fnBoolean(sequence).negate();
086  }
087}
